languages.text: "Колотить не велено. А ваши важные дела, господин офицер, подождут — пройдемте побеседуем".
"Beating's been banned. But your important officer's business can wait, sir — we need to have a chat."
languages.original_text: "Колотить не велено. А ваши важные дела, господин офицер, подождут — пройдемте побеседуем".

traits.locale_text: "Beating's been banned. But your important officer's business can wait, sir — we need to have a chat."
"Beating's been banned. But your important officer's business can wait, sir — we need to have a chat."
"Beating's been banned. But your important officer's business can wait, sir — we need to have a chat."
"Beating's been banned. But your important officer's business can wait, sir — we need to have a chat."
"Beating's been banned. But your important officer's business can wait, sir — we need to have a chat."

languages.text: “殴打船员是明令禁止的，不过您身为军官的要务恐怕得耽误一阵子了，长官。我们得好好谈谈。”
languages.original_text: "Beating's been banned. But your important officer's business can wait, sir — we need to have a chat."

traits.locale_text: “殴打船员是明令禁止的，不过您身为军官的要务恐怕得耽误一阵子了，长官。我们得好好谈谈。”

languages.text: «Las palizas se han prohibido. Pero esos asuntos suyos tan importantes tendrán que esperar, señor; antes vamos a tener una conversación».
languages.original_text: "Beating's been banned. But your important officer's business can wait, sir — we need to have a chat."

traits.locale_text: «Las palizas se han prohibido. Pero esos asuntos suyos tan importantes tendrán que esperar, señor; antes vamos a tener una conversación».

languages.text: 「殴るのは禁じられている。しかし、あなたの大切な士官の仕事は後回しにしてください。まずは話すことがあります」
languages.original_text: "Beating's been banned. But your important officer's business can wait, sir — we need to have a chat."

traits.locale_text: 「殴るのは禁じられている。しかし、あなたの大切な士官の仕事は後回しにしてください。まずは話すことがあります」

languages.text: "Prügel sind verboten. Aber Eure wichtigen Offiziersangelegenheiten können warten, Sir. Wir müssen uns unterhalten."
languages.original_text: "Beating's been banned. But your important officer's business can wait, sir — we need to have a chat."

traits.locale_text: "Prügel sind verboten. Aber Eure wichtigen Offiziersangelegenheiten können warten, Sir. Wir müssen uns unterhalten."

languages.text: « Si l'usage de la violence est désormais interdit, vos obligations d'officier, si importantes soient-elles, devront attendre. Nous avons à parler, vous et moi. »
languages.original_text: "Beating's been banned. But your important officer's business can wait, sir — we need to have a chat."

traits.locale_text: « Si l'usage de la violence est désormais interdit, vos obligations d'officier, si importantes soient-elles, devront attendre. Nous avons à parler, vous et moi. »

languages.text: "Dayak yasaklandı. Şu önemli subay işlerinse bekleyebilir beyefendi. Seninle biraz sohbet edelim."
languages.original_text: "Beating's been banned. But your important officer's business can wait, sir — we need to have a chat."
